meanings.definition: Performed or occurring without external stimulus
meanings.sent1: The sudden burst of laughter was a spontaneous reaction to the joke.
meanings.sent2: Her spontaneous smile lit up the room.
meanings.sent3: The spontaneous dance party in the park caught everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent4: His spontaneous decision to travel the world changed his life forever.
meanings.sent5: The spontaneous applause filled the auditorium with joy.

meanings.definition: Arising from a natural impulse or tendency
meanings.sent1: The artist's spontaneous brush strokes captured the essence of the scene.
meanings.sent2: She had a spontaneous urge to help the injured bird.
meanings.sent3: The spontaneous hug from the little girl melted everyone's hearts.
meanings.sent4: His spontaneous kindness towards strangers was truly admirable.
meanings.sent5: The spontaneous laughter of children echoed through the playground.

meanings.definition: Happening or arising without apparent external cause
meanings.sent1: The spontaneous rain shower took everyone by surprise.
meanings.sent2: The spontaneous applause erupted after the amazing performance.
meanings.sent3: The spontaneous disappearance of the cookies puzzled the family.
meanings.sent4: Her spontaneous recovery from illness amazed the doctors.
meanings.sent5: The spontaneous growth of wildflowers painted the field in colors.
